grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 思慕【シボ】yearning, longing for, deep affection
哀慕【アイボ】cherish the memory of, yearn for
kun reading compounds: 慕う【したう】to yearn for, to long for, to pine for, to miss, to love dearly, to adore, to follow (someone), to idolize (for virtue, learning, status, etc.)
